A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
If you are reading the audience critics in order to decide whether to buy the DVD or Blu Ray of this movie or not\, do yourself a favor and buy something else.
This movie is a parody of Star Wars\, made only to mock Star Wars\, its characters\, heroes\, lore and beliefs and\, most importantly\, to deride its fans and slap them in the face.
Disney decided that if you like Star Wars\, you are a stupid whiny white male\, possibly voting for Trump\, and served you with the most horrible SJW\, feminazi\, anti-male\, anti-white\, anti-war (in a movie called Star Wars!) propaganda shoved down your throat while showing you a gigantic middle-finger and a monstrous grin.
If you really liked the old Star Wars flicks\, this movie cannot\, in any single way\, satisfy you. 
If you like The Transformers or Ghostbusters 2\, you may like it\, though.
